posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:Mod on TTT
2) Your age:14 soon to 15 in a month
3) Your location: United States of the Americas PST
4) Current In-Game Name: [NNJG] NINJA BreadMan
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: STEAM_0:0:29209427, http://steamcommunity.com/id/thedemon09/
6) How did you find out about NNJG: NNJG's TTT server is one of the first servers I have joined on Garry's Mod
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:I can not pin point the exact amount of time but it is somewhere between one and a half years to two years
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: Moderation of TTT
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: I have been playing on NNJG's servers for a long time and often times I felt that if I was mod I would be able to help keep the server fun and enjoyable for others. 
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:I have no experience in this field. 
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:Yes 
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: To my knowledge i have never been banned kick of be slayed that i know of.
